title: Olivia Dean and Lola Young Lead Brit Award Nominations
summary: Olivia Dean and Lola Young are two new music stars who have many nominations for the Brit Awards this year. They each have five nominations, including for artist of the year. Other famous singers like Lily Allen and Dave are also nominated. Sam Fender has four nominations after winning another prize. The band Pulp is nominated again after a long time since 1996, when their singer Jarvis Cocker did a funny protest on stage. He jumped on stage during a Michael Jackson show and made funny moves, which got him in trouble but no charges. Now, Pulp is happy to be nominated for their new music. Olivia Dean might win best artist and best album because her album is very popular. She says it feels crazy to have so many nominations.

background_read: The Brit Awards are a big music award show in the UK where singers and bands get prizes for their songs and albums. It happens every year, and many people watch it on TV. New stars like Olivia Dean and Lola Young are becoming famous by making good music. Sometimes, singers do funny things on stage, like Jarvis Cocker did in 1996, which people remember for a long time. Being nominated for an award means your music is liked by many people.
Article_Structure: WHO: Olivia Dean, Lola Young, Sam Fender, Pulp, Jarvis Cocker, and other singers and bands
WHAT: They are nominated for Brit Awards, with Olivia Dean and Lola Young having five nominations each
WHERE: The Brit Awards ceremony in the UK
WHY: To recognize their music success and celebrate new and returning stars

perspectives.description: Olivia Dean and Lola Young are happy and surprised to be nominated, showing how new artists can become famous quickly.
